title: Task Manager
description: This is a project having features like task organization, filtering, and assignment,allowing users to add, edit, move, and share tasks easily.

title: Story Blog App
description: This is a project enabled users to register, log in, and create detailed stories with headings,descriptions, images, and category selection.

title: Quizzer
description: This is a project  Implemented a comprehensive dashboard for managing quiz creations, analytics, and user engagement, with options to edit, delete, and share quizzes.

title: Music Player
description: This is a project having an interactive playlist with seamless playback controls, real-time song duration, and a smooth, user-friendly music experience
